title: Raised Bed Garden. Learn as you grow

subtasks: Planting tomatoes, string beans, cucumbers, spinach, and winter greens from seeds
Thinning out plants when they reach a certain height
Protecting plants from cold temperatures by covering them
Caring for broccoli plants by removing damaged leaves
Assembling raised garden beds with materials like roof tin, wood, and bricks
Checking on winter greens (spinach) and broccoli for cold damage
Covering plants during cold spells to prevent freezing
